News.Title: Blue Chip India Reports Net Loss of Rs 16.03 Lacs in Q2 FY2026
News.Summary: Blue Chip India Limited posted a net loss of Rs 16.03 lacs for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, compared to a profit of Rs 1.38 lacs in the same period last year. The financial services company's total income declined to Rs 2.47 lacs from Rs 5.67 lacs year-over-year, with auditors noting inventory valuation concerns for unquoted shares.
